00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ring_buffer.h"
00030 
00031 /** @addtogroup Utilities
00032   * @{
00033   */
00034 
00035 /** @addtogroup Common
00036   * @{
00037   */
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup RING_BUFFER RING_BUFFER
00040   * @brief The source file of ring buffer.
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 #define IS_BUFFER_EMPTY(Read, Write)              (Write == Read)
00046 #define IS_BUFFER_FULL(Read, Write, Size)         ((Write + 1) == Size ? (0 == Read) : ((Write + 1) == Read))
00047 
00048 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup RING_BUFFER_Exported_Functions Ring Buffer exported functions
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00053   * @brief  Buffer initialization.
00054   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00055   * @param  puMemory: Memory allocate by application
00056   * @param  uSize: Memory Size. !!!! The available size is (uSize - 1) !!!
00057   * @retval None
00058   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00059 void Buffer_Init(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer, u8 *puMemory, u32 uSize)
00060 {
00061   pBuffer->uRead = 0;
00062   pBuffer->uWrite = 0;
00063   pBuffer->puMemory = puMemory;
00064   pBuffer->uSize = uSize;
00065 
00066   return;
00067 }
00068 
00069 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00070   * @brief  Read byte from buffer.
00071   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00072   * @param  puData: Pointer of returned data
00073   * @retval uResult: TRUE for read success, FALSE for no DATA
00074   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00075 u32 Buffer_ReadByte(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer, u8 *puData)
00076 {
00077   u32 uResult = FALSE;
00078   if (!IS_BUFFER_EMPTY(pBuffer->uRead, pBuffer->uWrite))
00079   {
00080     *puData = pBuffer->puMemory[pBuffer->uRead];
00081 
00082     pBuffer->uRead++;
00083 
00084     if (pBuffer->uRead == pBuffer->uSize)
00085     {
00086       pBuffer->uRead = 0;
00087     }
00088 
00089     uResult = TRUE;
00090   }
00091 
00092   return uResult;
00093 }
00094 
00095 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00096   * @brief  Write byte to buffer.
00097   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00098   * @param  uData: Data to write
00099   * @retval uResult: TRUE for write success, FALSE for buffer full
00100   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00101 u32 Buffer_WriteByte(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer, u32 uData)
00102 {
00103   u32 uResult = FALSE;
00104   u32 uDataLength;
00105 
00106   if (!IS_BUFFER_FULL(pBuffer->uRead, pBuffer->uWrite, pBuffer->uSize))
00107   {
00108     uDataLength = pBuffer->uWrite;
00109     pBuffer->puMemory[uDataLength] = uData;
00110 
00111     pBuffer->uWrite++;
00112 
00113     if (pBuffer->uWrite == pBuffer->uSize)
00114     {
00115       pBuffer->uWrite = 0;
00116     }
00117 
00118     uResult = TRUE;
00119   }
00120 
00121   return uResult;
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00125   * @brief  Read buffer.
00126   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00127   * @param  puData: Pointer of dada buffer for read
00128   * @param  uLength: Read length
00129   * @retval uCount: Data length of read operation
00130   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00131 u32 Buffer_Read(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer, u8 *puData, u32 uLength)
00132 {
00133   u32 uCount;
00134   u32 uResult;
00135   for (uCount = 0; uCount < uLength; uCount++)
00136   {
00137     uResult = Buffer_ReadByte(pBuffer, (u8 *)(puData + uCount));
00138     if (!uResult)
00139     {
00140       break;
00141     }
00142   }
00143 
00144   return uCount;
00145 }
00146 
00147 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00148   * @brief  Write Buffer.
00149   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00150   * @param  puData: Pointer of dada buffer for write
00151   * @param  uLength: Write length
00152   * @retval uCount: Data length of write operation
00153   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00154 u32 Buffer_Write(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer, u8 *puData, u32 uLength)
00155 {
00156   u32 uCount = 0;
00157   u32 uResult;
00158   for (uCount = 0; uCount < uLength; uCount++)
00159   {
00160     uResult = Buffer_WriteByte(pBuffer, *(u8 *)(puData + uCount));
00161     if (!uResult)
00162     {
00163       break;
00164     }
00165   }
00166 
00167   return uCount;
00168 }
00169 
00170 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00171   * @brief  Check if buffer is empty.
00172   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00173   * @retval TRUE for buffer is empty, FALSE for buffer is not empty
00174   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00175 u32 Buffer_isEmpty(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer)
00176 {
00177   return(IS_BUFFER_EMPTY(pBuffer->uRead, pBuffer->uWrite));
00178 }
00179 
00180 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00181   * @brief  Check if buffer is full.
00182   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00183   * @retval TRUE for buffer is full, FALSE for buffer is not full
00184   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00185 u32 Buffer_isFull(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer)
00186 {
00187   return(IS_BUFFER_FULL(pBuffer->uRead, pBuffer->uWrite, pBuffer->uSize));
00188 }
00189 
00190 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00191   * @brief  Get buffer length.
00192   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00193   * @retval length
00194   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00195 u32 Buffer_GetLength(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer)
00196 {
00197   u32 uRead = pBuffer->uRead;
00198   u32 uWrite = pBuffer->uWrite;
00199 
00200   if (uWrite >= uRead)
00201   {
00202     return (uWrite - uRead);
00203   }
00204   else
00205   {
00206     return (pBuffer->uSize - uRead + uWrite);
00207   }
00208 }
00209 
00210 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00211   * @brief  Discard Buffer data.
00212   * @param  pBuffer: Pointer of Buffer_TypeDef
00213   * @retval None
00214   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00215 void Buffer_Discard(Buffer_TypeDef *pBuffer)
00216 {
00217   pBuffer->uRead = pBuffer->uWrite = 0;
00218 
00219   return;
00220 }
